author: Madurai Bureau
text:
(Top) Deputy Commissioner of Police (Law and Order) Santhosh Hadimani distributing lemon juice to traffic police personnel at Palayamkottai bus stand on Sunday; (Above) Colechal Deputy Superintendent of Police Venkataraman distributing juice and butter milk to traffic police personnel near Mandaicaud.

(Top) Deputy Commissioner of Police (Law and Order) Santhosh Hadimani distributing lemon juice to traffic police personnel at Palayamkottai bus stand on Sunday; (Above) Colechal Deputy Superintendent of Police Venkataraman distributing juice and butter milk to traffic police personnel near Mandaicaud.

Distribution of lemon juice to traffic police personnel deployed at important junctions commenced here on Sunday morning.

As the State government has decided to distribute either lemon juice or buttermilk to the traffic police personnel once in every two hours between 8 a.m. and 4 p.m., Deputy Commissioner of Police (Law and Order) Santhosh Hadimani inaugurated the distribution of lemon juice near Palayamkottai bus stand.

Thoothukudi

Assistant Superintendent of Police (Thoothukudi Town) Arun Sakthikumar inaugurated the distribution of lemon juice to the policemen at VVD signal in Thoothukudi.

Kanyakumari

In Kanyakumari district, Colachel Deputy Superintendent of Police and Thuckalay DSP (in-charge) Venkataraman inaugurated the juice/ buttermilk distribution near Mandaicaud. Over 100 traffic police personnel in the four sub-divisions of Kanyakumari, Nagercoil, Thuckalay and Colachel would receive 300 ml juice or butter milk every day till June end. Deputy Superintendent of Police (DCRB) Kadher Basha inaugurated distribution of buttermilk/ juice at important junctions in Nagercoil town, officials in the District Police Office said.
title: Lemon juice, buttermilk for traffic policemen
